law.catch_line: Relation to restraint of trade and antitrust laws.
law.text: No cooperative, foreign cooperative, or agreements between cooperatives and their members shall be considered a conspiracy, a combination in restraint of trade, an illegal monopoly, or an attempt to lessen competition, fix prices arbitrarily, or create a combination or pool in violation of any law of this state.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 9, effective July 12, 2012.
